name: groupby
description: Lowercase variant of groupBy function. Groups events by specified fields and allows aggregation operations.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Array of field names to group by

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: Aggregation function to apply (count, sum, avg, min, max, etc.)

returns.description: Events grouped by specified fields with aggregation results

examples.description: Group processes by image filename with count
Group by computer and user with event count

notes: Functionally identical to groupBy() with uppercase 'B'
CQL is case-insensitive for function names
Prefer groupBy() for consistency with CrowdStrike documentation
